mapper.update:
update EXPENSETRACKER.EXPENSE
itemName = #{itemName},
category=#{category},
exptype=#{exptype},
expdate=#{expdate},
price=#{price},
qty=#{qty},
unit=#{unit},
pricePerUnit=#{pricePerUnit},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from EXPENSETRACKER.EXPENSE_CATEGORY where username in (#{param1}, 'admin')

select MIN(YEAR(EXPDATE)), MAX(YEAR(EXPDATE)) from EXPENSETRACKER.EXPENSE where USERNAME=#{param1}
and ITEMNAME = #{param2}

select ITEMNAME as "name", CATEGORY as "category", YEAR(EXPDATE) as "year", SUM(PRICEPERUNIT)/COUNT(PRICEPERUNIT) as "avgprice" from EXPENSE where ITEMNAME=#{param1} and USERNAME=#{param2} group by ITEMNAME, CATEGORY, YEAR(EXPDATE)

select ITEMNAME as "name", CATEGORY as "category", month(EXPDATE) as "month", SUM(PRICEPERUNIT)/COUNT(PRICEPERUNIT) as "avgprice" from EXPENSE where ITEMNAME=#{param1} and year(EXPDATE)=#{param2} and USERNAME=#{param3} group by ITEMNAME, CATEGORY, month(EXPDATE)
